metadata.description:
Welcome to the year 2099

With this concept I really wanted to think way outside the box and go past the year 2049.

Not only did I want to create a compelling art piece, I also wanted to create a story line which can be continued at anytime.

The year is 2099 and humans are more attached to their tech than ever, except for a few that are off the grid. See humanity has finally crossed that barrier between tech. 
They are now able to download themselves and their sub-conscious into their tech.

While in their tech they are able to live the life they always wanted, physically and mentally. Their senses are heightened with the new add-on 001-009RV suit which allows the user to smell, hear, see, touch and even taste their explorations.

No need to leave home, go for a walk, spend time with your significant other once in the add-on suit everything can be felt and imagined.

However there are still a few of the population who live on the outskirts and come into the city via the underground to get food, supplies and rebel against the tech driven government.
